column2: an A.M. Eatery////It was sooo delicious!!!!! Went on a weekday around lunch time and the wait was around 10-15 min. Service was good
column3: food was delicious! Â I got the Bella Bella bunny with the harsh brown
column4: really good! Alittle messy to eat so ask for extra napkins lol. The Omg French toast was really good
column5: but it was really sweet. Ask for extra fresh fruit if you're a fruit person. The fruit goes very well with the sweetness of the French toast.
